reviewText: This was a fabulous movie. I've been holding out hope that it would eventually be offered in a Region 1 (U.S. & Can.) format but it's be a few years now, and nothing. Too bad. It's worthy enough to be shown in h.s. science class. (Now that I think of it, to show it in a political science class might be good too, since it gives insight on how stupid politicians can be when trying to save a dime on a shuttle worth millions in order to afford more $950 military toilet seats.)
Excellent reconstruction of the Challenger tragedy and the fight against odd led by the physicist Richard Feynman to reach the truth.  Moving and convicing
